citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Protocol 00002278, approved 03/11/2022, did not contain a justification for the appropriateness of the number of animals
to be used. Review of the appropriateness of the number of animals to be used ensures that the IACUC is approving
scientifically valuable research that will produce replicable data leading to correct conclusions. The facility must ensure
that protocols contain a rationale for the appropriateness of the numbers of animals to be used.
Correct by August 10, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.31(e)(2) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
Protocol 00002278, approved 03/11/2022, did not contain a justification for the appropriateness of the number of animals 
to be used. Review of the appropriateness of the number of animals to be used ensures that the IACUC is approving 
scientifically valuable research that will produce replicable data leading to correct conclusions. The facility must ensure 
that protocols contain a rationale for the appropriateness of the numbers of animals to be used.  
 
Correct by August 10, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
